newsitem.title: SYRIA: Syria's Assad holds talks with Lebanon's Hrawi.
newsitem.headline: Syria's Assad holds talks with Lebanon's Hrawi.

text.p: Syrian President Hafez al-Assad held talks with Lebanese President Elias Hrawi in Damascus on Tuesday on Middle East peace developments and bilateral cooperation, officials said.
Syrian presidential spokesman Joubran Kourieh said Syrian Vice-President Abdul-Halim Khaddam attended part of the meeting at the presidential palace in the Syrian capital.
Syria is the main foreign power broker in Lebanon where it has some 35,000 troops.
